Alexandria.Town Hall Education Arts Recreation Camp: Town Hall Education Arts Recreation Campus (THEARC ) is a 16.5-acre (67,000 m2), 110,000-square-foot (10,000 m2) combined cultural and social services campus in Washington, DC’s Ward 8. The campus, located at 1901 Mississippi Avenue, SE, consists of three connected buildings, playgrounds, basketball courts, and public space. In May 2007 THEARC won the Urban Land Institute's Award for Excellence [1] and was cited for its contribution to the community, response to societal needs, innovation, public/private partnership, and environmental protection and enhancement.
